short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Displays pdf meta-data fields when viewing a pdf doc.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Shows the meta data fields for "Title" "Description" and "Creator" on pdf files. A button appears in the url bar when you are viewing a pdf, click it to bring up the metadata.
